sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { makeStyles, Container, Box } from '@material-ui/core' import { MainContainer } from '../../atoms' import Fade from 'react-reveal/Fade'; const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({ container: { width: '100%', marginTop: '10%', display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'space-between', alignItems: 'center', [theme.breakpoints.down('sm')]: { width: '100%', flexWrap: 'wrap', justifyContent: 'space-around' }, }, headBox: { width: '15%', height: '10rem', padding: '3% 0%', lineHeight: '1', [theme.breakpoints.down('sm')]: { width: '50%', height: '6rem', padding: '3% 2%', }, }, head: { color: '#D9393E', fontSize: '4rem', [theme.breakpoints.down('sm')]: { fontSize: '3rem' }, [theme.breakpoints.down('xs')]: { fontSize: '2.5rem' } }, subHead: { color: 'black', lineHeight: '1' }, container1: { display: 'flex', marginTop: '2%', justifyContent: 'space-between', [theme.breakpoints.down('sm')]: { flexWrap: 'wrap', alignItems: 'center', marginTop: '0%', flexDirection: 'column', } }, boxes: { height: '18vw', width: '18vw', display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', flexDirection: 'column', background: '#182AC3', '& img': { width: '30%', height: '30%', }, '& h4': { paddingTop: '4%', textAlign: 'center' }, [theme.breakpoints.down('sm')]: { height: '50vw', width: '50vw', margin: '1%' }, } })) export function Dnumbers() { const classes = useStyles() return (

300+
In-house Engineers

100+
active projects across the globe

20+
years and counting

6+
Business Verticals

1
Manufacturing Plant

Operating Base
India, UK, USA

In-house Design &
Manufacturing
Capability

Part of
Make-in-India
Initiative

 ) }
